short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional functionality to WhatsApp Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.0

WhatsApp Features :
* Quick Web Share : Easily share images, selected text, or URLs with just a few clicks.
* Bulk Send : Send message to multiple contacts simultaneously.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
whaBro does not have any business relations with WhatsApp.
